headline: Motorola Solutions Philanthropy And Insider Sales Offer Mixed Investor Signals
summary: Motorola Solutions Foundation announced over US$10 million in grants and more than 125,000 employee volunteer hours, focused on first responders and STEM education. The company reported record employee volunteerism, highlighting growing participation in its community programs. Separate from these initiatives, several executives, including the Chairman and CEO of NYSE:MSI, completed sizeable insider stock sales. Motorola Solutions, traded as NYSE:MSI, is best known for mission critical...
